items.sentence: Tom wanted Mary to stay where she was until he got back.
Tom was being questioned by the police in the next room.
Tom was glad to see Mary and John getting along so well.
Tom was impressed by how well Mary could play the flute.
Tom was just about to hang up when he heard Mary scream.
Tom doesn\'t go to the movies as often as he\'d like to.
I\'d like to see Tom and Mary get along with each other.
I\'m not the least bit interested in role-playing games.
I can\'t solve this problem. It\'s too difficult for me.
I can\'t tell you any more. I\'ve already said too much.
